short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a professional CV with a click of a button. Just head to your LinkedIn profile, fill in your details and click on the button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create a professional resume in one click.

Steps needed:
1. Head over to LinkedIn.
2. Add some useful information for each job and project. Describe your experience.
3. Click on the big blue button in the extension & wait.
4. Enjoy your professionally created resume
